sentence.text: Type II (middle type) patients show development delay and the distinctive facial phenotype (midface retraction, short and upturned nose), lacking both hydronephrosis and typical skeletal abnormalities, with existence of regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase IImutation.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: Type III (simple type) patients with regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II alteration show their major symptom is development delay, in which expressive language delay is the most striking feature.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II
